title: Exploring the dynamic world of energy at Enlit Asia 2023!
desc:
On the 15th of November, the PT Natuna Global Team took part in the Enlit Asia 2023 event held at ICE BSD. Enlit Asia, an annual conference and exhibition focused on the power and energy sector, serves as a crucial platform for industry leaders to share expertise, present innovative solutions, and strategize towards a low-carbon energy future in alignment with ASEAN's goals.

Our journey at Enlit Asia involved exploring numerous booths, where we had the privilege of visiting our vendor's booth, Galaxy1 Communication.

Enlit Asia operates as a year-round engagement platform for power and energy professionals in Southeast Asia, fostering connections, providing education, and driving advancements in the energy transition. Whether through digital interfaces or live events, the initiative brings together diverse stakeholders to enhance the availability, reliability, and sustainability of energy in the region.

At Enlit Asia, our mission is to dismantle silos within the industry, promoting collaboration across all facets of the ASEAN energy sector. This includes policymakers, regulators, technology providers, energy consumers, and an international perspective from the US, Europe, and Australia. This unique convergence aims to catalyze collective action towards a sustainable energy future for Southeast Asia.

This year's Enlit Asia, hosted in Indonesia following the previous year's event in Bangkok, holds particular significance. Indonesia, being the largest country in ASEAN, consumes approximately two-fifths of the region's energy. Recognizing the escalating energy demand across its 17,000 islands, Indonesia is diversifying its energy sources, shifting away from coal and imported petroleum to incorporate more renewables. The nation has set ambitious targets, aiming for 23% renewable energy use by 2025 and 31% by 2050.

Our team participated in discussions and interactions at Enlit Asia in various booths. Natuna Global is unwavering in its commitment to advancing collaboration. We are dedicated to enhancing the capabilities of 1Wave and crafting tailored solutions that align with the unique requirements and preferences of our valued customers.

Stay tuned for more updates on our endeavors towards a brighter and sustainable tomorrow!

title: AIS Unveiled: The Tech Behind Safer Sea Travel
desc:
Do you ever wonder how maritime professionals effortlessly manage vessel traffic and enhance safety on the open seas? The answer lies in AIS, the Automated Identification System. At Natuna Global, we bring this technology to life through our cutting-edge 1Wave tracking application. Let’s take a deep dive into AIS, its significance, types, and how 1Wave leverages it to revolutionize maritime management.

Understanding AIS (Automated Identification System) AIS is a game-changer in maritime technology, enabling vessels to communicate and share essential information seamlessly. This system is instrumental in enhancing maritime safety, streamlining traffic control, and improving overall efficiency. AIS-equipped ships continuously broadcast their positions, courses, speeds, and other crucial data via VHF radio frequencies.

The Data Displayed by AIS AIS provides a wealth of real-time data, including:

– Safety-Related Messages: These messages contain vital voyage information and weather warnings.
– Static Information: Includes details like IMO numbers, call signs, vessel names, dimensions, and types.
– Dynamic Information: Displays precise ship positions, status, Universal Time Coordinated (UTC), courses, speeds,headings, and sensor information.
– Voyage-Related Information: Provides data on draft, hazardous cargo, destinations, estimated time of arrival (ETA), route plans, and onboard personnel.

1Wave Application: Your Maritime Management Partner Natuna Global’s 1Wave tracking application is the bridge that brings AIS data to life. With our app, you can:

– Monitor vessel traffic in real time
– Ensure efficient traffic control and safety at sea.
– Access comprehensive ship information effortlessly.
– Receive timely weather updates and warnings.
– Enhance decision-making for maritime operations.

So, whether you’re navigating bustling ports or vast open waters, 1Wave is your trusted companion for seamless maritime management. Stay ahead of the game with the #1WaveApp and experience the future of maritime technology. Join us on this exciting journey of innovation and excellence!
